title: Rotational work - graph to compare work by torque

content.question: A varying torque is exerted on a rotating disk. The torque as a function of the angular displacement of the disk is represented in the graph. The work done by the torque on the disk from <math alttext="0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>0</mn></math> to <math alttext="2 theta" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><mi>θ</mi></math> is <math alttext="W sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>W</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math> and the work done by the torque from <math alttext="2 theta" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><mi>θ</mi></math> to <math alttext="6 theta" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>6</mn><mi>θ</mi></math> is <math alttext="W sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>W</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>. Which of the following correctly compares <math alttext="W sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>W</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math> and <math alttext="W sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>W</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="W sub 1 equals W sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>W</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>W</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="W sub 1 equals negative W sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>W</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mpadded><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>W</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mpadded></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="W sub 1 equals 4 W sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>W</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><msub><mi>W</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="W sub 1 equals negative 4 W sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>W</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mpadded><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></mpadded><msub><mi>W</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="W sub 1 equals W sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>W</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>W</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mstyle></math>
